text: Nebagenda bombi okutuusa lwe batuuka ku bantu b'omukitundu, nebasaba abantu baamu okubawa emmere naye baagaana okubafuula abagenyi baabwe, wabula baasanga mu kyo (ekitundu) ekisenge nga kyagala kugwa (Hidhiri) naakiddaabiriza (Musa) naagamba nti singa oyagadde waalikisabiddeko empeera (noosasulwa)
